$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-myworkstab.title: $:/xp/ui/Actions/new-myworkstab
$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-myworkstab.text:
\import $:/plugins-macros

<$vars newtabTitle={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title}}
  newtabCaption={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Caption}}
  newtabText={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Text}}
  storeTiddler="$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title/input"
  listopsTiddler="$:/plugins-my-works/newtab"
  >
<$reveal type="nomatch" state=<<newtabTitle>> text="">
<$action-setfield $tiddler=<<storeTiddler>> text=<<newtabTitle>>/>
</$reveal>
<$reveal type="match" state=<<newtabTitle>> text="">
<$action-createtiddler $basetitle=<<newtabTitle>> caption=<<newtabCaption>> tags=<<systemCTag>> text=<<newtabText>> list-before=<<listopsTiddler>>/>
<$action-deletetiddler $filter="$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title $:/config/new-myworkstab/Caption $:/config/new-myworkstab/Text [<storeTiddler>]"/>
</$reveal>
</$vars>

$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-plugincard.title: $:/xp/ui/Actions/new-plugincard
$:/xp/ui/Actions/new-plugincard.text:
\define get-tags() $(textFieldTags)$
\define get-text() $(textField)$
<$vars textFieldTags={{$:/config/new-plugincard/Tags}} textField={{$:/config/new-plugincard/Text}}>
<$action-sendmessage
	$message="tm-new-tiddler"
	title=<<now "plugin/YYYY0MM0DD0hh0mm0ssXXX">>
	tags=<<get-tags>>
	text=<<get-text>>
	caption="a plugincard"
	linkcolor=""
	moscow="M"
	url=""
/>
</$vars>

$:/xp/ui/PluginListItemTemplate.title: $:/xp/ui/PluginListItemTemplate
$:/xp/ui/PluginListItemTemplate.text:
\whitespace trim <$link to={{!!title}} class="tc-plugin-info">
<$transclude tiddler=<> subtiddler={{{ [addsuffix[/icon]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler={{{ [get[plugin-type]addprefix[$:/core/images/plugin-generic-]] }}}/>

''<$text text={{{ [get[name]] ~[split[/]last[1]] }}}/>''

<$view field="title"/>

<$view field="version"/>

actions="<$action-setfield $tiddler='$:/state/advancedsearchinsidebar/currentTab' text=<>/>"/> \end \define cancel-search-actions() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[{$:/temp/advancedsearch}!match{$:/temp/advancedsearch/input}]" emptyMessage="<$action-deletetiddler $filter='[[$:/temp/advancedsearch]] [[$:/temp/advancedsearch/input]] [[$:/temp/advancedsearch/selected-item]]' />"> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/input" text={{$:/temp/advancedsearch}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/advancedsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=".tc-advanced-search input"/> \end \define input-accept-actions() \whitespace trim <$list filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="<$list filter='[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]'><$action-navigate $to={{{ filter="[{$:/config/Search/NavigateOnEnter/enable}match[yes]]" emptyMessage="<$list filter='[<__tiddler__>get[text]!is[missing]] ~[<__tiddler__>get[text]is[shadow]]'><$list filter='[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]'><$action-sendmessage $message='tm-edit-tiddler' $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/>"> <$list filter="[<__tiddler__>get[text]minlength[1]]"> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-edit-tiddler" $param={{{ [<__tiddler__>get[text]] }}}/> \end \define toggleButton() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> default="table" type="match" text="table"> <$button tooltip="Switching to list view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="list"/> {{$:/xp/images/switch}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="table"> <$button tooltip="Switching to card view" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="table"/> {{$:/xp/images/switch}} \end

<> <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="table" animate="yes"> <$list filter=<>>

$:/plugins-currently-installed/Rewritten.title: $:/plugins-currently-installed/RewrittenTiddlers
$:/plugins-currently-installed/Rewritten.text:
\define deleteOTButton() \whitespace trim <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right" tooltip="Delete these rewritten tiddlers"> <$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete these rewritten tiddlers?"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]]"/> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} \end <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]!has[draft.of]is[system]has[plugin-type]each[plugin-type]sort[plugin-type]]">
<$reveal default={{{ [all[shadows+tiddlers]!has[draft.of]is[system]plugin-type{!!plugin-type}search:title,plugin-typeplugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]count[]] }}} type="nomatch" text="0"> <$text text={{{ [{!!plugin-type}sentencecase[]addsuffix[s]] }}}/>
    <$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]!has[draft.of]is[system]plugin-type{!!plugin-type}sort[]search:title,plugin-type]" variable="listPlugin"> <$reveal default={{{ [plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]count[]] }}} type="nomatch" text="0">

  1. <$link to=<>><$view tiddler=<> field="title"/> <>

      <$list filter="[plugintiddlers[]is[tiddler]sort[]]">
    • <$link><$view field="title"/>

$:/plugins-currently-installed.title: $:/plugins-currently-installed
$:/plugins-currently-installed.caption: 已装插件
$:/plugins-currently-installed.text:
\import $:/plugins-macros \whitespace trim \define lingo-base() $:/language/ControlPanel/Plugins/ \define storeTitle() $:/temp/search/plugins-currently-installed \define rewriteTid() $:/config/xp/aggregation-plugins/installed-plugins/Rewrite \define search-tips() <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="rewritten" default="table"> Search all fields except text <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="rewritten"> Search title \end \define cancel-search-actions() <$action-deletetiddler $filter=<>/><$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=".xp-search-installed-plugins input"/> \end \define controlButtons() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible"> <> {{$:/core/images/close-button}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="list"> <> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="rewritten"> <$vars rewriteState=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text=""> <$button set=<> setTo=yes tooltip="Help" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/help}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text=""> <$button set=<> setTo="" tooltip="Help" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> {{$:/core/images/help}} \end \define helpinfo() <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="" default="" class="tc-tiddler-info tc-popup-handle" animate="yes" retain="yes">
<$button set=<> setTo="" tooltip="Close" aria-label="close panel" class="tc-btn-invisible"> {{$:/core/images/close-button}}
此处查看被改写的插件条目，通过搜索插件可以对结果进行过滤。 改写有两种情况： # 用户条目改写默认条目。 # 默认条目改写默认条目。即根据插件的优先级，一个插件改写了另一个插件中的条目。 ''第一种情况：''通过删除按钮（经过确认后）可以删除用户条目，还原为默认条目。 ''第二种情况：''这里只能查看哪些插件改写了 $:/core 中的条目。操作方法为： * 第一步：<>。将 $:/core 中的插件条目保存到 $:/core/plugintiddlers。弹出提示「已完成」后，进行下一步。 * 第二步：<>。如果其他插件含有「核心条目」则[[显示|$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers]]。 > ''变动插件或者升级 TW 后，需重新执行以上相应步骤，以确保数据正确。'' > 对于插件开发者或者自定义玩家这非常有用，因为每次 TW 更新，你都需要检查一下，重写了 $:/core 中的条目是否新增了代码（新增了功能）。
我习惯给修改的核心条目（或者参照核心条目新建的条目）添加一个 `rewrite` 字段，比如 `rewrite: 5.2.3`，表示改写自 5.2.3 中的版本。 \end \define saveButton() <$button> 保存核心条目 <$list filter="[[$:/core]plugintiddlers[]]" variable="coreTiddler"> <$action-listops $tiddler="$:/core/plugintiddlers" $subfilter="+[append]"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/language/Notifications/Complete"/> \end \define runButton() <$button> 生成数据 <$list filter="[plugin-type[plugin]] -$:/core" variable="myPlugin"> <$vars storeTitle={{{ [[$:/config/rewritecoretiddlers/]addsuffix] }}}> <$action-deletefield $tiddler=<> list /> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> tags="$:/tags/Rewrite" name=<>/> <$list filter="[plugintiddlers[]format:titlelist[]]" variable="listItem"> <$list filter="[[$:/core/plugintiddlers]contains]" variable="ignore"> <$action-listops $tiddler=<> $subfilter="+[append]"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers" text=<> /> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="[tag[$:/tags/Rewrite]] :filter[get[name]!has[title]]"/> \end \define showRewriteData()
Rewrite core tiddlers
    <$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/Rewrite]has[list]sort[]search:list,name]" variable="listItem">

  1. <$link to={{{ [get[name]] }}}/>

      <$list filter="[listsort[]]" variable="rewrite">
    • <$link to=<>/>
\end <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio value="table"> 默认视图   <$radio value="list"> 列表视图   <$radio value="rewritten"> 改写条目
<> <$macrocall $name="keyboard-driven-input" tiddler=<> type="search" tag="input" focus={{$:/config/Search/AutoFocus}} inputCancelActions=<>/> <>
<$vars userInput={{{ [get[text]] }}} rewriteState=<>> <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="table" default="table" animate="yes"> {{$:/plugins-currently-installed/DefaultView}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="list" animate="yes"> {{$:/plugins-currently-installed/ListView}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="rewritten" animate="yes"> <> <$tiddler tiddler=<>> <$radio value="user"> 用户条目   <$radio value="shadow"> 默认条目 <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="user"> {{$:/plugins-currently-installed/RewrittenTiddlers}} <$reveal state=<> type="match" text="shadow"> <$list filter="[[$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers]is[tiddler]]" variable="ignore"> {{$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers}} <$list filter="[[$:/noncoreplugin/rewritecoretiddlers]!is[tiddler]]"> 请点击 help 按钮，参照第二种情况生成数据。

$:/plugins-help.title: $:/plugins-help
$:/plugins-help.text:
''PLUGINS 的用途：''收集和管理自己的 TiddlyWiki 插件。
! 如何使用？ !!! 点击 {{$:/core/images/new-button}} new plugincard 创建一个插件的信息卡片。 常用字段： |!Field |!Description | |`caption` |显示名称，通常是对 `title` 的简化。 | |^`moscow` |根据 [[MoSCoW Method|https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MoSCoW_method]] 对软件进行需求评级。
''M'' -- //Must have//，''S'' -- //Should have//，''C'' -- //Could have//，''W'' -- //Won’t have//。 | |`url` |插件的获取地址。 | |^`linkcolor` |//(optional)// 用于修改条目的链接颜色。你可以选择一个颜色，或者手动输入 `red` 或者 `<>`。
该功能由 $:/LinkStyle/Stylesheet 提供。 | !!! 在已装插件 -> 改写条目，你可以查看哪些默认条目被改写了。

$:/plugins-macros.title: $:/plugins-macros
$:/plugins-macros.text:
\define aggregationTag() Plugin Card \define systemCTag() $:/tags/MyWorks \define config-base() $:/config/xp/aggregation-plugins/Tabs/Visibility/ \define statusTid() $:/config/xp/aggregation-plugins/installed-plugins/View \define versionTid() $:/config/xp/aggregation-plugins/installed-plugins/ShowVersion \define versionButton() \whitespace trim <$reveal state=<> default="show" type="match" text="show"> <$button tooltip="Hide version" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="hide"/> {{$:/core/images/preview-open}} <$reveal state=<> type="nomatch" text="show"> <$button tooltip="Show version" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini"> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> text="show"/> {{$:/core/images/preview-closed}} \end 
<$view field="text"/>

\import $:/plugins-macros \define selectDefaultTab() <$select tiddler='$:/config/plugins-my-works/DefaultTab'> <$list filter='[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag!has[draft.of]remove[$:/plugins-my-works/newtab $:/plugins-my-works/managetabs]] :filter[lookup!match[hide]]'> \end ! 默认页面 设置维基启动后默认显示的标签页：<> ! 管理页面 Select which tabs will be shown. \define titleStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Title
\define captionStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Caption
\define textStoreTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Text
\define storeTiddler() $:/config/new-myworkstab/Title/input
\define newButton() {{$:/xp/ui/Buttons/new-myworkstab}}

\define deleteButton()
\whitespace trim
<$vars newtabTitle={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title}}>
<$list filter="[<storeTiddler>get[text]match<newtabTitle>]" variable="ignore">
<$button tooltip="Delete existing tiddler" class="tc-btn-invisible tc-btn-mini tc-small-gap-right">
{{$:/core/images/delete-button}}
<$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you wish to delete this tiddler?">
<$action-deletetiddler $filter="[<newtabTitle>] [<storeTiddler>]" />
</$action-confirm>
</$button>
</$list>
</$vars>
\end

\define promptText()
<$vars newtabTitle={{$:/config/new-myworkstab/Title}}>
<$list filter="[<storeTiddler>get[text]match<newtabTitle>]" variable="ignore">
{{$:/aggregation/ErrorText}}
</$list>
</$vars>
\end

$:/plugins-my-works.title: $:/plugins-my-works
$:/plugins-my-works.caption: 我的作品

\import $:/plugins-macros

<$wikify name="tabsList" text="""<$list filter="[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag<systemCTag>!has[draft.of]] :filter[lookup<config-base>!match[hide]]" variable="listItem"> <$text text={{{ [<listItem>format:titlelist[]] }}}/> </$list>""">
<$macrocall
  $name="tabs"
  tabsList=<<tabsList>>
  default={{$:/config/plugins-my-works/DefaultTab}}
  state="$:/state/tab/plugins-my-works"
  class="" <!-- tc-vertical -->
/>
</$wikify>
